name: Hermes
god:
God of boundaries, roads and travelers, thieves, athletes, shepherds, commerce, speed, cunning, wit, and sleep
Psychopomp and divine messenger
symbol: Talaria, caduceus, tortoise, lyre, rooster, Petasos (Winged helmet)
parent:
Zeus and Maia
Uranus (mythology)|Uranus and Hemera (Cicero and Hyginus)
sibling: Aeacus, Angelos (mythology)|Angelos, Aphrodite, Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Dionysus, Eileithyia, Enyo, Eris (mythology)|Eris, Ersa, Hebe (mythology)|Hebe, Helen of Troy, Hephaestus, Heracles, Minos, Pandia, Persephone, Perseus, Rhadamanthus, the Charites, the Horae, the Litae, the Muses, the Moirai
